constituent: distress, autumn, wheat, cereal, fire, heart
koohiiStory1: In AUTUMN, the farmer´s HEART is in DISTRESS as to if he has enough crops. Even better, the farmer will experience great DISTRESS in his HEART if his WHEAT catches FIRE!
koohiiStory2: Here we have distressed (think "gloomy") people with "seasonal mood disorder" during the autumn season. Hence "autumn heart" is distressed (gloomy).
myStory: chữ Sầu. lo, buồn, thảm. mùa thu trong tim
readingExamples: 愁い (うれ.い), 愁える (うれ.える)
